scripts.start:back: npm run dev:back && npm run server:back
scripts.start:api: npm run build:api && npm run dev:api
scripts.copy:views: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path backend/dist/views | Out-Null; Copy-Item backend/src/views/* backend/dist/views/"
scripts.copy:views:api: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path api/dist/views | Out-Null; Copy-Item api/src/views/* api/dist/views/"
scripts.prod:front: npm run build:front && npm run preview:front
scripts.prod:back: npm run dev:back && npm run server:back:prod
scripts.prod:api: npm run build:api && npm run dev:api:prod
scripts.prod:front:unix: npm run build:front && npm run preview:front
scripts.prod:back:unix: tsc -p backend/tsconfig.json && npm run copy:views:unix && npm run server:back:prod
scripts.prod:api:unix: tsc -p api/tsconfig.json && npm run copy:views:api:unix && npm run dev:api:prod
